summary: HeroSection.tsx now references the new JPEG asset URL for the hero background, but the diff does not show the JPEG being added to publicly served static assets. Two additional non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file `myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg` to the frontend static assets (e.g., `frontend/public/assets/...`) so it is publicly served and accessible by URL.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so there is no evidence that `myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg` was actually added to `frontend/public/...` (or any other static assets location), even though HeroSection now references `/assets/myplace-qro-hero-image.jpeg`.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to swap the Hero background image and add the JPEG asset; it does not request updating summary/documentation files.
The BuildRequest does not request changes to internal project state tracking files.
